website_summaries.verdict: This solid door or window awning provides instant extra cover that will last for seasons to come.
pros: Kits can link together for extending length
Great for keeping the rain off
cons: The screws that come with this mounting kit are not the strongest and you may want to buy upgraded screws for your installation

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Sturdy, we had strong winds and no issues. Helps when rains.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly cheap and wobbly. It looks better on the picture then in real life. The plastic looks like its painted metal in the picture but its flat plastic real life - had a hard time putting it up due to it being incredibly flimsy and cheap. Have to look for something else to replace this. Update - we got a little bit of snow last night, first time since we put this up, and the whole thing fell off. And no, it was not installed incorrectly, my husband managed to build a whole house by himself, I have no doubt he installed it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Dorota E. Kopacz

customer_reviews.title: A light weight awning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a quick solution for a lightweight awningwith nice style - although I haven’t installed it yet. It is very light in terms of the plastic brackets and awning material. My star rating is mainly for the ease of an awning although I really thought the polycarbonate was going to be a several mm thick piece of plastic. Hopefully this will perform even better than my expectation and I will update my review after mounting it. The plastic has corrugation in the middle of it. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Picks n Pans

customer_reviews.title: They changed the details two piece design is awful
customer_reviews.text: The first pair although a challenge to install look great and keep the rain off as intended. I ordered two more. They changes the orientation on the plastic and made it in two pieces with a splice. It was even harder to assemble especially on a ladder. It does not look as good; instead of a smooth curve it buckles. With the tubes crosswise water gets in. The older ones were a better product, but needed a bigger box to ship. Don't buy it unless they promise to send the original with one piece roof.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S. Obenski

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully and looks lovely when installed
customer_reviews.text: Got this for above my parents back door. It works wonderfully and looks lovely when installed. Shipping was fast, assembly wasn't to difficult and it has held up through the winter perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I must say that it was a little difficult putting it together. Definitely a two man job. You have to tape the sections together at first because every time you move it, a section falls apart. Also make sure you level it before hanging. We did not and the house siding was not level!! We had to adjust the screws but did not take it down. Being said, I LOVE it. It is great looking, sturdy, but light. Comes out far from the door with plenty of rain shielding. Glad we got the double sided one. It also blocks the HOT South Carolina sun. It was a good purchase and I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: very difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: you better have good handy man skills or you won't stand a chance of getting this in place. First the instructions are worthless. you do not receive all the screws you will need to hold it together. I had to improvise and drill holes thru the end pieces and put screws I got at the hardware store thru the end supports and into the plastic support arms to hold the thing together. One review said they did it one section at a time which I didn't think of but might work better. once I got it up (you'll need several helpers) it works pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.author: M Hosfelt

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: My products came in. I attempted to contact the seller but Ive had no reply. Pictures are were worth a thousand words. I purchased three of these Picture 1. In everyone package the translucent covers had smashed places on them. Picture 2. One of the brackets were broken Picture 3. Every package was way short of screws
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Sonnier

customer_reviews.title: Survived a wind storm
customer_reviews.text: I heard the 30 MPH gusty wind last night and I was worried. It's still there. *Don't use the bolts provided if you have Portland Stucco. Use the concrete Threaded Screws instead* The TINTING does work great.
customer_reviews.author: paradise

customer_reviews.title: Held up in the wind
customer_reviews.text: I have a retractable awning that jumped a foot in the air so, I pulled it in. And I was really worried that this’d be toast, but it held.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would like to add a revision to the review that I had written before. Originally I received a product in an open box without screws. It might have happened during shipment. Manufacturer was very cooperative and tried to fix the problem by sending a new awning. There were misunderstandings in the process which delayed my project, but they were very quick in responses and finally I received a new awning. The product is not very strong, but I used weather proof tape to hold the panels and brackets together to ensure it will stay in place during a storm. so far It has been few weeks with several rainy days it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Manoochehr

customer_reviews.title: Weak, plastic, Chinese garbage. Cracked and flew off in light wind.
customer_reviews.text: I attached this to my concrete home in Florida a foot under the soffet overhang of my roof. I used tapcon screws, and a light 20 mph wind cracked the plastic footings and tore it off the side of the house. These are junk, don’t waste your money or time. Total garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Randolph V. Rome Jr.

customer_reviews.title: look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I just want to see when snow falls and there are strong winds see have good it is . but it looks very nice It feels a bit flagil when removed from the box but after this assembly feels resistant. we will see with the winds arrive in mass
customer_reviews.author: kevin j

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good but it is not installed as of yet as there are no adequate installation instructions or fasteners. Sent email requesting information as to how to attach product to building. Received back you tube instructions how to assemble product. Duh?! Sorry, Charlie. Won’t be purchasing anything from you again. So, buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: James F. Korinek

customer_reviews.title: ok product but poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: not for the casual DIY person, the instructions are almost not existent, the mounting bolts are for masonry attachment which is ok in my case but no mention is made of other structures, and no size of drill mentioned or the fact that you will need a pilot hole and then a masonry drill! how do retailers get away with this!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. King

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, easily installed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution to an uncovered back door. I checked all reviews and and looked at other 'fake' sites where you can find the cheaper. They are also made cheaper. This is larger in size than the ones sold on the China sites like Wish etc. And I am sure, much better made!. It went up easy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: It is

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not that helpful. Some of the screws did not actually screw into a pre-drilled hole - there was only a groove in the frame where the screw was supposed to be secured. So every time I try to pick up the assembled awning, it falls apart. I saw another purchaser that said he had to make his own holes for the screws. Overall, the awning feels cheap and flimsy. I will be throwing this away, because unfortunately I am past the return period. And I would feel guilty even giving it away for free.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McJunkin

customer_reviews.title: You will need to get better mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions do not cover how to mount to siding. All included videos show it mounted to a flat wall. Even at that, they do not demonstrate the wall mount instructions. I used Spacers to mount to the wood siding across two levels so that it remained level. The Awning is very sturdy and should hold up nicely. Included wall anchors may be appropriate for install on brick. I had to obtain additional hardware to mount correctly to wood siding. Overall, a satisfactory product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F. Bulick

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Clear inserts dont fit well at all leaving gaps on either side. Frame assembled correctly but clear inserts varying in size and are too narrow or out of square, not fitting properly
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: it looks nice but thats all
customer_reviews.text: it was hell putting this thing together. they need to re engineer this product it has lots of potential. do I recommend this product no. its hard to assemble its a definitely a two person job its flimsy it feels as if the slightest wind will blow this thing apart. buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: monserrat felix

customer_reviews.title: Great awning for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great awning for great price. If you need to add some weather protection to an outside door, this is an easy and inexpensive way to do it. It was a little struggle trying to install it by myself, but with two people it should be easy. It was the best price I could find for something like this. I wish they made some similar ones that extend even further, but it’s good enough to protect the door.
customer_reviews.author: ezmfp

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: We like the overall look when it was installed. My husband, a DIY master had some difficulty installing the product because it kept coming apart. BUT, when he allowed me to help, it went smoothly. That being said, it is definitely a 2 person project. We put it over the stairs to our side porch. It looks great and is definitely keeping the area dry that we wanted to protect. So grab an extra set of hands and have at it. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Recenello

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, all plastic, weak
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -I got my refund Cons: -Doesn't stop enough of the heat to make enough a difference -Both of them that I ordered arrived damaged -It's ALL PLASTIC, even the screws -The only thing that is metal are the anchors -Flimsy and doesn't hold together well -Basically, any high winds would rip the plastic right off of the anchors -The shade itself isn't dark enough to do what it needs. sunlight goes right through
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value!!!! I had a few issues but that's on me with concrete drill bits but what a beautiful product
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product. Light weight for sure but does the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product. Light weight for sure but does the job and keeps my doormat dry. Definitely a 2 person job.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept and design
customer_reviews.text: I like it except for the assembling which is not that easy as it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and install however, the front part of the awning where the poly extends out needs to be straight at all times. Since the poly material curls up a gap appears because of this. It should been designed to have a bar or anything in front of it to weight down and keep the poly material straight and aligned with the brackets to keep it from curling. The small screws are so-so in keeping the material inside the slot. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: CLadera

customer_reviews.title: looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: this product definitely disappointed me at first look.... but after I installed it(wasn't easy, needed help) it came out sturdy and reliable, days later was a hurricane, survived no problem.... a very helpful tool is an "impact drill", it's an absolute must for this project, don't even bother without it
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and effective
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We purchased this to go over a bench for our dog to keep the rain off. Perfect size and easy installation. Haven't had any big storms yet and not sure how it will hold up this winter with heavy snow. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Gisele Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material that will not last
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about getting this awning until I opened it. After opening it and starting to put together, I realized it is made of very cheap plastic material. I am a General Contractor and I returned the item because this is not built strong enough to hold up to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: adams11

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not good...
customer_reviews.text: The frame to this is a semi-sturdy plastic. The canopy part is a type of plastic that is very weak and mars easily. It looks good hanging but I doubt it lasts. One 10-15 pound branch from a tree and it's over.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaBoom

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was bad
customer_reviews.text: My parents have this same thing on there house, so I wanted to buy it for myself. I absolutely love it i just wish when it got to me it was in better shape. The corners of both panels were dented along with a nice scratch on the top. Other then the shipping problems its a wonderful onning.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Bean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product, great looking, sturdy once installed. Recommend using lots of 1/2" or 3/4" self tapping lath screws to hold it together better while assembling and for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S. Sluyk

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or $$
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to put together. As soon as you get one corner/edge in, another one pops out. Tried putting it together on the ground and everything popped out. Tried gluing it together, that didn't work either. Tried putting it together on the house for some stability, most aggravating thing on the planet. Ended up taking it down in frustration and it sits in the garage, $70 wasted on crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not very sturdy. The plastic pieces have fallen off so many ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s not very sturdy. The plastic pieces have fallen off so many times, it’s silly. We currently have them taped up until I can get something else. If the pieces stayed in place this would be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JAdams

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, cheap material, wrong bolts
customer_reviews.text: This product looks a lot nicer online. It is made of cheap plastic material and the bolts it came with was not make for wood. It is better to use a regular lag both to mount. The price also dropped over $25 since I bought it less than a month ago, bummers for me. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Verry fragile
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but verry fragile, first wind took it down, sides broke and desmemberd everithing
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: The top pieces do not fit right in the sides as they are to short by about 2-3 inches and the hardware they give you to attach it seems to be for concrete not a house so might work on a business but not an older wood house provided the top pieces are actually cut the right length
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy
customer_reviews.text: Ended up not being able to put both Pieces up because screws were not long enough to hold it in place and a total pain in the butt to put together basically a 2 person job all the way around
customer_reviews.author: Alyssas

customer_reviews.title: Window awning
customer_reviews.text: The polycarbonate panels are very thin and scar very easily. Be care when assembling. I’ll update once the unit has been up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Menefee

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful. I hope they resist winds. My only issue was that when installing, frames in the middle were difficult to keep in place.
customer_reviews.author: Davikary

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, arrived in a box that was used previously, corners of panels bent and creased, obviously returned once before. Panels are not solid polycarbonate, more like cardboard. This will not survive a year in Florida!
customer_reviews.author: TheVigil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much ordered a second one. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Total piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of crap! Screws don't keep it together so u can hang it. U move and it just falls apart! This the 2nd one and both were broken. I shouldnt have bought it when it was cold out...so didnt know the 2nd one was broke until we tried to out it up.
customer_reviews.author: valerie thompson

customer_reviews.title: Panels arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. It seems that the screws inside the box scratched and dented the panels. See picture. The outside of the box looked fine, however the package with the screws were loose inside the box. There needs to be a better job of not letting the screws move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: Very very cheaply made. This is a case of you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and install. Really keeps the heat down while still letting the light in.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Creely

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Well it took 2 weeks longer then it should have for me to get this. When i did get it the box was in bad shape and the the panels where all scratched up dented and bent. Same wen for the frame it came in and the hardware was loose in the box to who knows if its even all there. Dont waste you time or money
customer_reviews.author: justin pfeffer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: if you’re low with budge, this one if the best one! definitely buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Nelvyn Esposo

customer_reviews.title: Look nice
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but takes a bit of time to assemble them. Looking forward to getting them up. Ordered 6.
customer_reviews.author: C10berg

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: So far we luv it its perfect for over our front door
customer_reviews.author: jan p ham

customer_reviews.title: Loud in the rain
customer_reviews.text: It’s LOUD during a rainstorm. Not higher quality but worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Danny Nucci

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: This product is flimsy and broken. I want a refund and I will return this broken product. Not only was the product and box damaged when I recieved it today, we took the product out of the box and it was not what I thought it was.
customer_reviews.author: lora sharp

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Putting this thing up is no joke! Have at least another person or 2 more. But as many times as it came apart trying to put it up it’s not broken yet and I say yet because I gave up after 2hrs. Will try again later with more people and trying some of the other suggestions
customer_reviews.author: cajungrneyes74

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: I do love this, very happy easy to install with two people, price is right also
customer_reviews.author: Bussy

customer_reviews.title: 👍✅👍
customer_reviews.text: It definitely takes more than one person to assemble and hang. It looks great and just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K J

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, but...!
customer_reviews.text: This was neither easy to assemble or install, but all in all it was better than expected. So far it has withstood the wind and rain. It did come dented, by the way.
customer_reviews.author: kyotocafe93

customer_reviews.title: Not for every climate..
customer_reviews.text: I did like it at first but it didn't last long..it broke from the sides..do not recommended it for places with snow..
customer_reviews.author: Ana castillo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still working on figuring out the installation. Is a bit more fragile, than expected
customer_reviews.author: D. Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVED THIS when it came-was easy to put up and looks great and protects us under the awning from those little rain showers! Also kept the snow away from the patio door !!
customer_reviews.author: karen zentz

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: VERY flimsy plastic shade. Will not stand up to the winds of summer or the heavy weather of other seasons. This is a real piece of junk and quite expensive for what you get. Look elsewhere for a quality shade.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking for the price. Not sure how durable it will be against hail.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Strong once in place but have two ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Strong once in place but have two people to put it up as it was crazy hard by my self but that's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: JPearson

customer_reviews.title: This product can’t be used in places that gets snow
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed with this product. This product Is unable to withstand a 1 Inch snow and the support frame broke into pieces
customer_reviews.author: Sri Van

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and very easy to install. Best of all it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they don't tell the measurements of the brackets.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. The reason I returned it was because the brackets that fasten to the h house were longer than I expected they wouldn't fit above the door.
customer_reviews.author: bill wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Broke with the first snow.
customer_reviews.text: If you happen to get snow, do not buy this product. We live in Flagstaff Arizona, only had a few inches of snow and down it went. Broken to pieces cracked the brackets and now it’s in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT J. PANZARELLA

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Is berry good cover a lot a space I buy 6 We put a 10-inch board to put the panel does not move with the wind I send a portrait so you have an idea
customer_reviews.author: Maria siller

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, pictures are misleading. This is all plastic, if you live in an area with summer storms or windy this is gonna wind up in your neighbors yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Company
customer_reviews.text: Company was easy to work with to solve any issues I had with the awning...Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dlussier

customer_reviews.title: Multiple units don't hold when installing.
customer_reviews.text: I had to create an assembly holder to hold and carry all the pieces assembled together before installing. The screws didn't hold the multiple pieces together (design issue)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Durable and strong for New England weather. No problems so far with all the strong winds, snow storms and rain.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Stay dry!
customer_reviews.text: This awning is perfect, as it keeps the rain or snow melt from dripping on us as we unlock the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months. Not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a few months. Broke at the mount joint from the weight of some snow that was on on on it.
customer_reviews.author: as

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last; poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these awhile back and just learned that the panels blew out of it in a normal rain storm. Ordered a second one prior to learning of this. Will not buy another
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wren Clise

customer_reviews.title: The plasic is peeeling  is weird
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the product until now that noticed the plastic is peeling a all that debris is falling on the terrace floor
customer_reviews.author: Carmen R. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Using the awning to shield from rain while entering the main door. It hasn't rained yet but I a confident this will serve us well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H

customer_reviews.title: Poor Choice to make
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. I sent it back immediately. I thought it would be far more than what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Cutshall

customer_reviews.title: Back bar orientation
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instruction is not sufficient regarding orientation of the back support bars.
customer_reviews.author: nhianh chu

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great keeps the rain off my door and the sun as well
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Awning
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Looks good , no leaks , just need a second person for install to make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The plastic siding on the top flew off and is nowhere to be found. It hasn’t even been 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and arrived late
customer_reviews.text: It arrived late, and it was missing 4 parts. Returned for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Moreland

customer_reviews.title: if installing on brick have a hammer drill and proper size bit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. easy to install with proper tools. took less than 1 hour
customer_reviews.author: Ted Cook

customer_reviews.title: All parts damaged
customer_reviews.text: 90%of the parts came defective or used!! I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Too much money for a bunch of plastic and exposed bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Kasprowicz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great item, very easy to install, it adds a nice cosmetic look, and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: olivia dellinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Yes but it would have been better if the sides would have been made of aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: crivers

customer_reviews.title: Please make sure this will suit your needs prior to ...
customer_reviews.text: Please make sure this will suit your needs prior to purchasing. After I received mine, realized it was not as I expected. Directions could be more specific. Contacted seller and they resolved my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: was not as sturdy as picture depicted
customer_reviews.text: Product did not stay together, was not as sturdy as picture depicted. I was not pleased with this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is not fun
customer_reviews.text: trying to put this thing together is torture, you will need a least two people. I did it alone but it was not easy. They could have sent some decent instructions with tips on how to assemble. Now that I got it down pat I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: fwoddo

customer_reviews.title: The Product looks nice and serves it's purpose well
customer_reviews.text: The Product looks nice and serves it's purpose well, Because of the Arc it extends off the wall 37", Support arms are plastic with the upper and lower support pieces are made of tin that you slide over the polycarbonate sheets that are like a piece of cardboard if you are looking at the raw edge so when looking through it you see all the ribs. It is of middle of the road quality however if it holds up then it was a good buy for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: hd4x4f250

customer_reviews.title: We love the clear awning because it doesn’t block the light ...
customer_reviews.text: We love the clear awning because it doesn’t block the light but keeps us from getting wet went it rains. The awning runs across our doorway and steps, so we stay dry coming up the steps and into the house. There isn’t anything we dislike about it. It was easy to assemble and install. My husband bought a board, pre-painted it, assembled the awning and we attached the awning to the board. We lifted the board and awning to the side of the house and attached it to the side of the house. We hope it rains again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Wind (40 mph gusts) TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, beautiful, Yes light weight... Easy to INSTALL - NO WAY... Does it last "NO" and the UV protection - the Clear turns to Yellow - Not even a full year. Amazon is GREAT - this SELLER is NOT... :-(
customer_reviews.author: The Girls

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick but needs modifications
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, the hardware that comes with it is pretty much useless..and it was missing parts at that. With a product like this everyone is going to have different installation needs so plan on spending an additional $20 in purchasing the hardware specific to your application. The product itself is very flimsy and cheap looking. I installed it on a shed, which in my opinion is probably what it's best used for. I would be embarrassed to install this on my house. I would suggest 3 people to install it as you need two people to hold it and one to screw it in.
customer_reviews.author: Brien

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Not an easy installation! Missing some screws and difficult to keep assembled. Used similar screwed we had on hand and kept a piece in with some packing tape until it was up. Need two or better yet three people to put it up. Luckily my husband is handy and was able to make it work. It looks great and seems to do the job keeping the rain away from the door. Let’s see how it takes strong wind.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moen-Darr

customer_reviews.title: Seems flimsy at first but is actually pretty sturdy once it’s up
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I’ve only had it up a few weeks but it’s been through a few rain storms and held up very well. We had to modify it slightly because of the siding on our house we added a few washers to the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Bus Lady

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were written by a third grader. The supplied mounting bolts are expansion bolts only for masonry. The screws that hold the frame together are cheap and strip easily. Also nothing holds the rear of frame together until it’s bolted to the wall. Corners of panel crushed in transit due to poor packaging. Very cheap construction will be surprised if they last the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Great looking awning
customer_reviews.text: Worked out perfectly. It came with concrete bolts so we had to pick up wood bolts. Also, until you torque it in, it won’t be taunt. But once it was up, and tight, it was perfect. Won’t know more til next winter. Looks great though!
customer_reviews.author: SF Native

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money / requires a little modifying
customer_reviews.text: One of the two panels had some dents in it but you can't really see them now that it's installed. Assembly was quick and straight forward, but we used longer screws than the ones provided. We also added a few additional screws to the middle of the frame. This really increased the sturdiness of it overall. It has completely transformed the look and feel of the house! We love our house now :) The canopy is subtle and lets a lot of light in.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

product_meta.title: VIVOHOME Polycarbonate Window Door Awning Canopy Brown with Black Bracket 40 Inch x 80 Inch
feature_bullets: DURABLE DESIGN - Made with durable polycarbonate panel, ABS bracket and aluminum stripe, this awning resists rusting and corrosion from the elements
SUBTLE AND INVITING - Create an inviting entrance for your home or business while protecting you and your visitors from rain, snow, sun, and harmful UV rays

MODERN LOOK - Neutral in color, these awnings match nearly any home or outdoor decor; Please kindly note that the product color may slightly vary due to photographic lighting sources or your monitor settings
EASY CONSTRUCTION - The do-it-yourself kit includes all installation hardware and wall-mounting hardware accessories, ensuring your awning stays safe and secure
2-PERSON INSTALLATION - We recommend two people to install the awning; Please regularly check all fittings and connections and tighten them if they are loose
